name: Ghost Hunted
description:
You play as a ghost called Phyntom, you are on a quest to find all of your past relics to you can move on to the afterlife. The only problem is pesky paranormal investigators are about, searching for any evidence of ghosts! 

You have to avoid the investigators while obtaining your relics so you can move on to the afterlife and avoid being trapped in purgatory for ever.

Controls

W A S D to move
Q & E to activate abilities (once unlocked)

Objectives
Search the map(s) for Relics

Once you have obtained all 3 you will move onto the next level and gain new abilities.

Avoid enemies & their flashlights

Have fun.

All of the scripts and art assets were done by myself, all of the audio was sourced from https://freesound.org/ & https://incompetech.com/
Music is composed by Kevin MacLeod.

This is my first ever game, so any feedback is welcome.  I have plans on expanding this in the future.

Hope you enjoy!
